# Update User Avatar

    PUT accounts/:account_id/users/:user_id/avatar
    
Updates a [User]'s avatar




## Parameters
### URI Parameters
None
### Body Parameters
Field | Data Type | Required | Description
--- | --- | --- | ---
content_type | string | Y | The type of file that is being uploaded
base64 | string | Y | A base64 encoding of the image to be uploaded

## Example
### Request

    PUT https://api.zingle.me/v1/accounts/11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111/users/c16dd162-3712-4f5d-a157-13e781baa7f4/avatar


#### Request Body    
```json
{
  "content_type": "image/png",
  "base64": ""
}
```

### Response
``` json
{
  "status": {
    "text": "OK",
    "status_code": 200,
    "description": "User avatar updated"
  }
}
```

[User]: README.md
